user_query: I'm a songwriter and I'm looking for inspiration for my next song. Can you give me the lyrics for the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson? Also, provide me with the details of an artist using the artist ID 567072. And while you're at it, show me the popular songs in the Shazam charts.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the lyrics for the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson.
Fetch the details of the artist using the artist ID 567072.
Get the current popular songs in the Shazam charts.
